actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill for the relief of to authorize the documentation of the vessel, Unicorn, as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a certain vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States upon compliance with the usual requirements, so long as the vessel is owned by a citizen of the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of to authorize the documentation of the vessel, Unicorn, as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.
